items.sentence: I wish we were doing the same thing that Tom is doing.
I wonder why Tom thought it was a bad idea to do that.
Tom\'s favorite things at school are lunch and recess.
Tom\'s friends knew that he was having money problems.
Tom called to say he wouldn\'t be at today\'s meeting.
Tom\'s sense of smell isn\'t as good as it used to be.
You aren\'t the only one who\'s had problems with Tom.
There\'s nothing I like as much as the smell of roses.
Tom said that he would\'ve come if he\'d been invited.
Tom will probably figure out it was Mary who did that.
